definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.GLASS_BOTTLE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><comment pinned="false" h="52" w="289">This gets the coordinates of the provided entity, then prints the coordinates in the action bar.</comment><value name="text"><block type="text_join" inline="true"><mutation items="1"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">You have regained +20 Mana!</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:PlayerMana</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:PlayerMana</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
